column1: Éomund was the high ranking captain of the Éothéod.

column2: he rode with his lord Eorl to the aid of the Gondor in the Battle of the Field of Celebrant. After the victory there against the Balchoth
column3: Éomund witnessed the Oath of Eorl Eorl vowed to Cirion
column5: and helped organise the newly founded Rohan.

column3: is a frequently used Old English translation of genuine Rohirric logo-
